author: Michael Thompson
comment: I really 'felt' the 'spin' on this app. What a cracker! Its such a welcome 'break' from usual 8 Balll Pool umpiring apps. Others just didn't think of all the requirements but this developer has really listened to every single 'tip'. He must have been in a great 'frame' of mind when writing it.
title: Fantastic! Innovative! Well thought out!

author: Glenn Lynch
comment: Easilly the best timer I've used. I love that i don't have to look at the phone after every shot or watch the phone when time is getting close.  However a more convenient way to pause the clock would be better. Maybe touch and holding with haptic feedback so the umpire does not have to look away from table. Well done.

author: Zebedee Morales
comment: I don't know this app.... help me....!
title: How

author: Tariq Majeed
comment: I think its a bekaar App

author: Ben Davis
comment: All pool umpires should use this
title: Very nice

author: Robert potter
comment: Love this app, have been using for a long time in many android phones, however numbers only show up in landscape view when using on my HTC one max, probably just a screen compatibility issue so not too passed just wanted to let the developer know.

reply.author: DMB
reply.content: Hi Robert. Thanks very much for bringing this to my attention. An update has just been released which should fix this issue. If the issue persists after updating then please email me at 8ballref@denley.me

title: Great except...

author: RAF Jose
comment: Comprehensive understanding  not to mention trendy and slick
title: Definitive

author: Bernie Keegan
comment: DONT PLAY THIS GAME WORST GAME EVER

reply.author: DMB
reply.content: Hi. Thanks for trying out this app. This app is not actually a game. It's not listed in any of the games categories, and I can't see anything in the description that would cause this confusion. If you let me know how this misunderstanding has happened then I'll take steps to prevent it from happening for others. Thanks again.
